profileAlternative.name: Phong Nguyen
profileAlternative.headline: JAVA, .NET, NODEJS
profileAlternative.summary:
I'm Phong, a software developer, with good knowledge of Database Design, Design Pattern, Object-Oriented Programing.
Learning new languages and technologies is what I am passionate about (I self-taught ASP.NET MVC5 with 3 weeks).
I am considered a team-player because I like to help other and tend to work well within groups. I can also do some mentoring tasks and do code reviewing for other team members. I like helping other and work well with group. I can also do some mentoring tasks and code reviewing for other members.

positions.title: FPT Software
positions.description:
My responsibilities at FPT Software Company were:
• Supported for upgraded Sakai system, an e-Learning system that trains employees of the company.
• Analyzed and planned to upgrade the Sakai system.
• Researched Tin Can API and developed functions to track the learning process of learners on the Sakai system with this API.
• Wrote documentation for my research.

positions.title:
Title
.NET Software Engineer Intern
positions.description:
Responsible for designing and implementing FPT Software Library website with a team of seven at FPT Software. This site includes management functions for: books in stock, borrowed and returned books, automatically send email for borrowers and authentication with the CAS system.
Responsibility for database design, website design and implemented project with C# ASP.NET MVC5, Entity Framework, Bootstrap 4, MS SQL Server, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and other technologies. In this project, I and my team applied three-tier architecture and Single-ton design pattern into project.
